destinations.title: Mount Kilimanjaro
destinations.description: It is the highest mountain in Africa.\nThe highest single free-standing mountain in the world.\n5,895 metres (19,341 ft) above sea level and about 4,900 metres (16,100 ft) above its plateau base.
activities: Visiting of the Chala Crater lake
